thread.title: The Daily Heat Index: Drake and Beyoncé Record a Track We Can't Stop Listening To
thread.title_full: The Daily Heat Index: Drake and Beyoncé Record a Track We Can't Stop Listening To | Maxim

author: Maxim Staff
title: The Daily Heat Index: Drake and Beyoncé Record a Track We Can't Stop Listening To
text:
Here's your daily dose of what's heating up the internet:
The Answer is 'Yes'
This Saturday, while you were knuckle deep in a jar of queso, Beyonce and Drake dropped "Can I." This isn't the first time they've teamed up on a song, but this may be the first time that they caused full-bodied goose bumps with one.
ABC Adds 'Marvel's Damage Control' to Line-Up
Sure, The Avengers have a knack for saving the world, but they also leave a hefty load of destruction in their wake. Ever wonder who's in charge of cleaning up their mess? ABC is giving us the inside look, with their new single-cam comedy series that will follow the overused and underpaid employees who specialize in dealing with these explosive episodes, based on the comic book from the same name. Is there anything Marvel can't do?
American Apparel Goes Bankrupt
In a move that we all saw coming, American Apparel has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection. While this isn't a sign that the company will soon close, it is a definite stepping stone for turning the company around. While it's clear that we can't expect more of the ad campaigns we've come to love , it's slightly encouraging to hear that the company is not planning on closing any more locations.
Jell-O Meets Tennis Racket The Slow Mo Guys are at it again, this time unleashing some gelatin carnage upon the world. The duo took turns swatting everyone's least favorite desert with a tennis racket, and it's exactly as glorious as you hoped it would be. I don't think you're ready for this jelly.
